entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Midland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:27 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 10:00 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -6.1°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h gust 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
